text: Solve this question on: ssh cka7968 Install the MinIO Operator using Helm in Namespace minio . Then configure and create the Tenant CRD: 1. Create Namespace minio 2. Install Helm chart minio/operator into the new Namespace. The Helm Release should be called minio-operator 3. Update the Tenant resource in /opt/course/2/minio-tenant. yaml toinclude enableSFTP: true under features N 4. Create the Tenant resource from w /opt/course/2/minio-tenant. yaml @ It is not required for MinlO to run properly. Installing the Helm Chart and the Tenant resource as requested is enough
